name: (E)-4-hydroxyphenylacetaldehyde oxime,[reduced NADPH-hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase
definition: (E)-4-Hydroxyphenylacetaldehyde oxime + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> (S)-4-Hydroxymandelonitrile + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
